feature1.explanation: Both texts use informal punctuation marks such as hyphens, parentheses, and quotation marks.

feature2.explanation: Text 1 uses formal language with specific terms related to political stances. Text 2 contains informal language with casual expressions and slang.

feature3.explanation: Text 1 has longer and more structured sentences, while Text 2 has shorter, more fragmented sentences with colloquial language.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 has a serious and analytical tone, discussing political ideologies. Text 2 has a casual and opinionated tone, expressing frustration.

feature5.explanation: Both texts are relatively free of spelling and typographical errors.

overall.explanation: Considering all the features, the overall confidence score that the texts were written by the same author is moderate.
